name: Safety In Motion Flight Center
about: Safety In Motion Flight Center, located at Pierce County Airport in Puyallup, Washington, is a comprehensive flight school dedicated to providing top-notch aviation training. We offer a range of programs from recreational flying to career-oriented training, including the Horizon/Alaska Airlines' Pilot Development Program. Our unique approach combines traditional classroom and aircraft training with a state-of-the-art full motion Redbird FMX flight simulator, allowing pilots to practice in various global locations and weather conditions. We cater to both US and non-US citizens, with TSA approval for international students. Our experienced instructors tailor training to individual needs and schedules, ensuring a cost-effective and goal-oriented learning experience. Whether you aspire to fly recreationally or pursue a career with an airline, Safety In Motion Flight Center is committed to helping you achieve your aviation dreams.
